issue.title: [Plasma] Store object_id only once in object table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2954](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2954). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is the first part of ARROW-2953, i.e. the duplicated storage of the object id both in the key and the value of the object hash table.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2954?focusedCommentId=16565357) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2353
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2353>
